title: The Spellsparkler
content:
The Spellsparkler Rare 1~8 Damage Versatile - Wielding With Both Hands 1d8 (1d6) Bludgeoning Electric Veins: When the wielder deals damage with a spell or cantrip, they gain 2 Lightning Charges. Weapon Enchantment +1 Main Hand OnlyTopple Yrre the Sparkstruck intended to give the spellsparkler to Lenore, a cleric of Mystra and old lover. But when the gnome returned to the cleric's tower, they found it empty - inhabited only by dust and abandoned experiments. Quarterstaff Versatile 1.8 310
